2025-02-05.title: Toyota Raises Annual Profit Guidance Despite Drop in Quarter
2025-02-05.description: Toyota Motor Corp. raised its annual operating profit outlook even though quarterly income fell short of estimates due to a downturn in global sales and production, indicating that it sees activity picking up at a faster pace later.

2025-02-18.title: Toyota Is Supporting LG Battery Plant With $1.5 Billion Order
2025-02-18.description: Toyota Motor Corp. has agreed to shift a $1.5 billion order with LG Energy Solution to bolster operations at a Michigan battery plant after General Motors Co. backed out of the project, according to people familiar with the matter.
